title: Hitachi Energy India posts multi-fold rise in Q3 net profit at Rs 23 cr
description: Hitachi Energy India reported a significant increase in its net profit, reaching Rs 23 crore for the quarter ending December 31, 2023, due to higher revenues. The company's profit after tax rose by 400% year-on-year. Revenues for the quarter increased to Rs 1,276.4 crore from Rs 1,041 crore in the same period the previous year.
